sentences.en: Also called daylight overdraft, daylight exposure and intraday credit.
sentences.cn: 也称日间透支 、 日间风险、日内信用.

sentences.en: An overdraft resulted when a $ 1000 cheque was drawn against only $ 900 in the account.
sentences.cn: 当账户上只有900美元时你支取1000美元,那就造成了透支.

sentences.en: An overdraft results when a note discounted at a bank is not met when due.
sentences.cn: 银行贴现的支票到期而未能支付就成为透支.

sentences.en: Could we take up the question of the interest rate charged for the overdraft facility?
sentences.cn: 我们谈一下透支便利的利率问题,好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Her bank warned that unless she repaid the overdraft she could face legal action.
sentences.cn: 银行警告她如果不偿还透支钱款，她将面临诉讼。

sentences.en: How for me to get an overdraft at your bank?
sentences.cn: 你们银行难道不能给透支 吗 ?

sentences.en: It is very useful to have an overdraft facility.
Low on finance and beware of overdraft for this month.
sentences.cn: 金钱运低迷,小心这个月透支啦!

sentences.en: Many students have a free overdraft facility (= agreement with their bank to have an overdraft up to a particular limit ).
sentences.cn: 许多学生都能享受免费透支服务。

sentences.en: The bank manager was a bIt'sticky about letting me have an overdraft.
sentences.cn: 银行经理不太同意让我透支.

sentences.en: The borrower can terminate an overdraft facility at will.
sentences.cn: 借用人得自由终止透支便利.

sentences.en: The overdraft arrangements had been generous because of the regularity of the half-yearly payments.
sentences.cn: 因为是每半年定期还款，所以透支额度还算高。

sentences.en: They discuss the interest rate charged on the overdraft facility.
sentences.cn: 他们要商谈的是透支利率问题.

sentences.en: We honored the check as the overdraft was only 5 yuan.
sentences.cn: 我们承兑这张支票的透支额只有5元.

sentences.en: When I left Cambridge I had a £10,000 overdraft.
sentences.cn: 我离开剑桥时，透支了1万英镑。

sentences.en: You can have a $ 1000 overdraft on this account.
sentences.cn: 这个帐户可以透支1000美金.
